description: Fall hikes and winter runs, chilly days at the crags – our warmer Essent legging is perfect for all-mountain adventures in the colder seasons. Constructed from a nylon and elastane interlock with a brushed backer, it’s warm, breathable, and has excellent stretch. A wicking finish speeds moisture transfer. Two thigh pockets are easy to access on the move, and the wide waistband is comfortable all day long.
name: Essent Warm High-Rise Leggings, 26` Inseam - Womens
